item.description:
Hey all!

Paul van Dyk is electronica's world phenomenon, hailing from Berlin, Germany, and has been voted #1 DJ in the world many times over! His show will leave you breathless, shaking, and in awe of how far music has come since the first people banged on stones with sticks.

Update: I'll be taking an early evening train to NYC, and will meet everyone at Roseland Ballroom at 10:30p, downstairs by the coat check and bathrooms. I'll have my phone on me, but it could be pretty loud, so feel free to send me a text message.

If folks are staying overnight at one of New York City's fine hotels, perhaps we could link up for brunch Saturday morning/afternoon? I had planned on staying at the Hotel Penn, and doing the whole "let's meet up before the show for dinner, etc" but plans do evolve! I'm really excited to party with everyone! Let's meet at Roseland and see where the night takes us!

Tickets for the show are currently $50, and that price expires Thursday March 13 at midnight! I think the price is becoming prohibitive for the first-timer, but it's still cheaper than Billy Joel! The show will probably sell out!

I have gone down to NYC, partied to PVD, and taken the last train out of NYC (departing 1:49am and getting in at 3:57am), but this time I'd like to stay overnight and relax a bit. Not staying the night is do-able, the cheapest option, and still fun, but I would rather have the freedom to do more during my visit to the city, and therefore will be getting a hotel.

Made, the promoter has the event info, as well as ticket ordering info.

Eric is your contact: 860-214-9361.
Each person is responsible for ordering their own ticket, arranging transportation to/from the event, and lodging reservations (if any). I hope you'll join me- it'll be a lot of fun!
item.name: Paul van Dyk at Roseland Ballroom, NYC March 14, 2008!
